channel.title: I Need a working 508 ipban command :) Thanks
channel.description:
Hey moparscape users,
now i am using mezzy scape-508 source, and i really cant seem to code the ipban correctly, whenever i try to ip ban somone, it doesnt register as an ip ban, it just says that you've ipbanned them but they log straight back in, has anyone got a working 508 ipban command, i really could do with the help, and im making a v2 of it, if its sucessfull i might release on here, With Credits To The Creators, thank you.

item.title: I Need a working 508 ipban command :) Thanks
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

i think mine is working…it has the last times ive used it, so ill post you one:
else if (cmd[0].equals(“ipban”)){
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" “) + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2.rights < 1) {
if (p2 != null) {
Engine.fileManager.appendData(”./data/banned/bannedhosts/" + Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket) + “.txt”, “IpBanned”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just IpBanned " + p2.username);
}
}
else if (p2.rights >= 1) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You cannot ipban staff!”);
}
}
reply if this does not work.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need a working 508 ipban command :) Thanks
